name: IELTS test format explained
details: Test takers who understand the format of IELTS are at an advantage. Make sure you’re familiar with how IELTS testing works.

name: Free online IELTS practice tests
details: Prepare for IELTS with our free practice tests and answers.

name: IELTS expert Facebook sessions
details: The IELTS Expert Live Sessions on Facebook give test takers the opportunity to interact with an IELTS teacher and ask questions about the test.

name: IELTS on computer preparation
details: Use our range of practice materials to familiarise yourself with the IELTS on computer test and improve your English level.

name: IELTS for UKVI and Life Skills practice tests
details: Prepare for your IELTS for UK Visas and Immigration (Academic) on computer test with free sample questions.

name: IELTS Progress Check
details: IELTS Progress Check is an official, online practice test. Completed tests are marked by IELTS trained and qualified markers and you will receive a Feedback Report including an indicative band score for each section of the test.

name: EnglishScore Tutors - IELTS preparation tutoring
details: Reach the score you deserve with a 1-to-1 IELTS tutor. Try your first session today for $1.

name: IELTS Coach – personalised, online coaching
details: Join our fully personalised online IELTS preparation course with IELTS experts. Combine online group or private live classes to maximise your score.

name: IELTS books and study guides
details: You can benefit from a wide range of IELTS preparation books and materials, created by some of the world’s leading English language specialists.

name: Free IELTS mobile apps
details: Our free IELTS apps allow you to learn English flexibly – wherever you are and whenever you want to prepare.
